channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Data Migration Strategy
item.description: Some practical and technical thoughts on how to execute a data migration project. Specifically consumer data from a legacy system as part of a big bang or phased migration, where the discovery, data quality, migration rules, business rules and configuration of the target system is ongoing throughout the project. Some of these approaches may be relevant for other data migrations. Adopting best practice from software development Link to heading Continuous delivery Concept of a build Automate repeated tasks Fast feedback loop Automated testing Source control If it’s not in source control then it doesn’t exist Seperation of concerns Involving the business Link to heading Value mapping sheets Shared code for migration logic Fast feedback loop Logging Sandbox Link to heading class hello_sayer: def __init__(self, greeting = "Hello"): self.
